XXvabhdicu:4799: tadyathā madhuravāgdevadatta iti vāci mādhuryaguṇayuktasya guḍadravyasya madhuno vā sādharmyamabhilaṣaṇīyatā vidyate ityato vāci mādhuryaśabdaḥ prayujyate /

XXvabhdicu:4863_1: rājatvaṃ kurvantyevamanāgatasya vastunaḥ sato hetupratyayāḥ sametya lakṣaṇamātraṃ

XXvabhdicu:5000: ityevaṃ tāvat traidhātukāḥ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyābhāvanāheyāśca dharmā uktāḥ //

XXvabhdicu:7373: teṣāṃ dvāvaśubhasvabhāvau prathamau tadākāratvād bhūmitaśca tau sasāmantakayoḥ prathamadvitīyayordhyānayordhyānāntare ca /
XXvabhdicu:7380: catvāro 'nye vimokṣāḥ samāhitāḥ kuśalā evārūpyāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:7388: (Jaini_431) ataḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmākhyaṃ bhavāgrānantaraṃ tāṃ samāpattiṃ samāpadyante /
XXvabhdicu:7390: vyutthānacittamapyasyāḥ svaṃ śuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ tvadhaḥ // Abhidh-d_595 //
XXvabhdicu:7405: bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇadurvarṇāni khalu rūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti,
XXvabhdicu:7408: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyapramāṇāni suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvadidaṃ dvitīyamabhibhvāyatanam /
XXvabhdicu:7409: evamadhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahī rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānyapramāṇāni ceti catvāri /
